title: New: A. G. Cook – Beautiful
body: With the world finally catching on to the genius that is that **PC Music** family, and hordes of articles cropping up lauding their output, alongside questioning the longevity of such a project, it’s only a matter of time before one of their artists stumbles upon a mainstream break through. Of those most likely to, producer and PC kingpin **A. G. Cook** seems perhaps the most capable of doing so, and latest track, _Beautiful_, is a glorious crossover between early 00’s happy hardcore, and sugary sweet bubblegum pop, that somehow, just _works_. Check it out.
